sentences.en: "Forgive my manners," she said calmly. "I neglected to introduce myself."
sentences.cn: “请原谅我礼数不周，”她平静地说。“我忘了自我介绍了。”

sentences.en: How can I love myself when I look like this?
sentences.cn: 我这个样子，怎么能对自己满意呢？

sentences.en: I blame myself for what has happened.
sentences.cn: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.en: I didn't want to impose myself on my married friends.
sentences.cn: 我不想打扰自己已婚的朋友。

sentences.en: I felt incredibly ashamed of myself for getting so angry.
sentences.cn: 我对自己发那么大的火而深感惭愧。

sentences.en: I find it really hard to drag myself out and exercise regularly.
sentences.cn: 我发现要让我自己定期出门锻炼真的很难。

sentences.en: I find myself growing increasingly angry at the absurdity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 对如此荒谬可笑的情况我感到越来越生气。

sentences.en: I found myself in water only three feet deep.
sentences.cn: 我发现脚下的水只有3英尺深。

sentences.en: I found myself smiling back instinc-tively when our eyes met.
sentences.cn: 我发现当我们的目光相遇时，我本能地还以微笑。

sentences.en: I let myself out into the street and pulled the door shut.
sentences.cn: 我出门上街并拉上了门。

sentences.en: I lived there once myself, before I got married.
sentences.cn: 我结婚前曾独自在那儿住过。

sentences.en: I too am committing myself to continue the fight for justice.
sentences.cn: 我本人也保证将继续为正义而战。

sentences.en: I went to Brooks Brothers and bought myself a decent shirt.
sentences.cn: 我去布鲁克斯兄弟专卖店给自己买了一件体面的衬衫。

sentences.en: I worked myself into frenzy plotting ways to make him jealous.
sentences.cn: 我绞尽脑汁，处心积虑，就是为了让他嫉妒。

sentences.en: I wrote that song just to cheer myself up.
sentences.cn: 我写那首歌是给我自己打气的。

sentences.en: I'm trying to move on and stretch myself with something different.
sentences.cn: 我正想换工作，想尝试点不一样的事情来挑战一下自己。

phrases.tran_cn: 见 be 条 be oneself, not be oneself

trans.tran_en: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action
